text: That Peter Crouch Podcast star Peter Crouch in 2006 That Peter Crouch Podcast is an entertainment and sports podcast hosted by Peter Crouch, Chris Stark and Tom Fordyce. Ostensibly a guide on how to be a professional footballer, the episodes include insight on everything from dressing rooms, transfers, managers, football confessions and other details of the modern game. The podcast has been consistently one of the most popular podcasts in the UK since its launch, attracting 12 million listens in 2019.
